definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="121" y="97"><field name="trigger">tooltip_event</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:CrystalliteArmorHoney.body</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="is_key_pressed"><field name="key">Shift</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7Absorption Limit:</field></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§92x Original Max HP</field></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7Regeneration Rate:</field></block></value><next><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§92HP every 20s</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="new_tooltip_line"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§8Press Shift for details</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
